title: Update Home page Premium Services section id to premium-services-old

requirements.text:
Update the Home page Premium Services section markup in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` so the section that contains the "Our Premium Services" heading uses the exact section id `premium-services-old` (i.e., `
` with `

Our Premium Services

`).
acceptanceCriteria: In `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx`, the section that renders the Premium Services cards has `id="premium-services-old"`.
The section still renders an `<h2>` with the exact text "Our Premium Services".

requirements.text: Update the Home page "Order Now" smooth-scroll behavior in `frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx` so it scrolls to the section with id `premium-services-old` (instead of the current `services` id), using `scrollIntoView({ behavior: "smooth" })`, without adding any raw `<script>` tags.
acceptanceCriteria: Clicking the "Order Now" button in the Home hero smoothly scrolls to the Premium Services section with `id="premium-services-old"`.
No new raw `<script>` tags are added to `frontend/index.html` to implement this behavior.

constraints: Use English for any user-facing text.
Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` or other paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
Frontend routing must continue to use TanStack Router (no react-router-dom).
nonGoals: No redesign of service card visuals beyond what is required to change the section id and scroll target.
